about.title: About me
about.primary: I'm a software engineer driven by curiosity and drawn to complexity. I have a passion for building scalable systems with a focus in backend development and data-driven analysis. I'm currently seeking new grad SWE roles related to AI startups & real time fintech systems where I can contribute to high-performance, impactful products.
about.secondary: Beyond the keyboard, you'll find me immersed in various sports, trying new food, or critiquing new movies.

projects.title: AI Movie Suggestion Webapp
projects.description: Deployed a full-stack AI webapp using Railway to provide personalized movie recommendations using Flask & React. I Developed a multi-threaded Selenium web scraper to efficiently scrape user rating history from their public Letterboxd profile. Using this data I trained an XGBoost model with 10+ features (Bag of Words/1 hot encoding) to predict user ratings on a 20000 movie dataset

projects.title: +EV Sports Betting Odds Finder
projects.description: Engineered a serverless batched-data pipeline with Python to ingest, normalize and analyze sports betting odds using Pandas to find +EV/arbitrage opportunities, with scheduled execution using AWS Lambda function.Setup real time alerts for profitable bets using Amazon SES and configured AWS CloudWatch to monitor performance.

projects.title: Insight.AI - AI Twitter Fact Checker Extension
projects.description: Built a chrome extension to fact check tweets by parsing HTML and passing context into GPT 3.5â€™s API using ReactJS. Used prompt engineering to get specific answers in appropriate formats from GPT. Developed a simple UI to display the output with the additional option to view the full output.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: This is where you can describe about your contact. The more you describe about your contact, the more chances you have!
